summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Fifty ($50.00) Dollars out of the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of V. Muscolo, for injuries to a horse, received on the 24th day of April, 1915, while said horse was being driven along the south side of Charles Street, between one and five feet east of the 8th Avenue crossing, in the City of Seattle, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
